code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. pt also reports of mild difficulty with reading and writing. pt is a male aged 71 yrs. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 61.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:patient presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school and mild difficulty with reading and writing for past 6 days. he is a 71 yr old male. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 184 cm, Weight 59.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
